headline.print_headline: Vision and Obesity Researchers Are Winners of Lasker Awards
headline.main: Vision and Obesity Researchers Are Winners of Lasker Awards

docs.lead_paragraph: The awards honored research that led to a cure for a type of vision loss and that may help understanding into obesity.
docs.snippet: The awards honored research that led to a cure for a type of vision loss and that may help understanding into obesity.

headline.main: In Worries About Sweeteners, Think of All Sugars

docs.abstract: High-fructose corn syrup has become major concern for many American consumers despite fact that it has been found to be no more harmful than other refined sugar sources; researchers, like Michael Jacobson, Center for Science in the Public Interest executive director, say that consumers should be reducing number of calories from all sugars to fight obesity and other chronic health conditions; drawing (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: Are you worried about high-fructose corn syrup in your diet? If you answered yes, you're not alone. Today, about 55 percent of Americans list the infamous corn sweetener among their food-safety worries, right behind mad cow disease and mercury in seafood, according to the consumer research firm NPD Group.
docs.snippet: Are you worried about high-fructose corn syrup in your diet?     If you answered yes, you're not alone. Today, about 55 percent of  Americans list the infamous corn sweetener among their food-safety  worries, right behind mad cow disease and mercury...

keywords.value: CENTER FOR SCIENCE IN THE PUBLIC INTEREST
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: In Worries About Sweeteners, Think of All Sugars

docs.abstract: Most nutrition scientists say that consumer anxiety about high-fructose corn syrup is misdirected. All added sugars, they say, including those from sugar cane and beets, are cause for concern.
docs.lead_paragraph: Are you worried about high-fructose corn syrup in your diet?
docs.snippet: Most nutrition scientists say that consumer anxiety about high-fructose corn syrup is misdirected. All added sugars, they say, including those from sugar cane and beets, are cause for concern.

headline.seo: At a Roosevelt Market, Produce Replaces Fast Food
headline.print_headline: Providing Fresh Vegetables to a Community Where Fast Food Reigns
headline.main: Fresh Vegetables Where Fast Food Reigns

docs.lead_paragraph: The Roosevelt Community Farmers’ Market on Long Island works to inspire healthier eating habits in an area where food options tend more to fast food.
docs.snippet: The Roosevelt Community Farmers’ Market on Long Island works to inspire healthier eating habits in an area where food options tend more to fast food.

headline.seo: Social Reinforcement as a Path to Better Health
headline.print_headline: Better Health, With a Little Help From Our Friends
headline.main: Better Health, With a Little Help From Our Friends

docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists are studying relationships among friends, co-workers and neighbors to learn how they can be used to improve public health.
docs.snippet: Scientists are studying relationships among friends, co-workers and neighbors to learn how they can be used to improve public health.

headline.print_headline: To Keep a Child Safe, Just ...
headline.main: Keeping Kids Safe From the Wrong Dangers

docs.lead_paragraph: Parents tend to worry more about remote dangers (terrorists) than mundane ones (obesity, football).
docs.snippet: Parents tend to worry more about remote dangers (terrorists) than mundane ones (obesity, football).

headline.seo: Diet Drug From Arena Rejected by F.D.A. Panel
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Panel Urges Denial Of Diet Drug
headline.main: F.D.A. Panel Urges Denial of Diet Drug

docs.lead_paragraph: By a 9-to-5 vote, the advisers decided that the potential benefits of the drug lorcaserin, from Arena Pharmaceuticals, did not outweigh risks.
docs.snippet: By a 9-to-5 vote, the advisers decided that the potential benefits of the drug lorcaserin, from Arena Pharmaceuticals, did not outweigh risks.

docs.abstract: An advisory committee voted against approving a weight-loss drug by Arena Pharmaceuticals, citing in part potential heath risks.
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal advisory committee Thursday voted against recommending approval of a new weight loss drug developed by Arena Pharmaceuticals.
docs.snippet: An advisory committee voted against approving a weight-loss drug by Arena Pharmaceuticals, citing in part potential heath risks.

headline.main: Doctors' Group Attacks McDonald's in TV Ad

docs.abstract: A new commercial uses a corpse clutching a hamburger to talk about the dietary effects of eating fast foods.
docs.lead_paragraph: A new television advertisement that singles out McDonald's for obesity-related deaths is causing quite the stir.
docs.snippet: A new commercial uses a corpse clutching a hamburger to talk about the dietary effects of eating fast foods.

headline.seo: Teaching Doctors About Food and Diet
headline.print_headline: Teaching Doctors About Nutrition and Diet
headline.main: Teaching Doctors About Nutrition and Diet

docs.lead_paragraph: Physicians still don’t know enough about food and diet, and some medical schools are seeking to change that.
docs.snippet: Physicians still don’t know enough about food and diet, and some medical schools are seeking to change that.
